模块 com.example.demo
程序包 com.example.demo.Display

类 HeartDisplay

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Display.HeartDisplay
public class HeartDisplay extends Object
A class that manages the display of hearts in the game. It creates and maintains a container (HBox) that holds a number of heart images. This class can also add or remove hearts dynamically based on game events.

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型

    说明

    container
    The container that holds the heart images.

    The x-coordinate of the heart container's position.

    containerYPosition
    The y-coordinate of the heart container's position.
    private static final int
    HEART_HEIGHT
    The height of the heart images in pixels.
    private static final String
    HEART_IMAGE_NAME
    The path to the heart image file.
    private static final int
    INDEX_OF_FIRST_ITEM
    The index used to remove the first heart from the container when a life is lost.
    private int
    numberOfHeartsToDisplay
    The number of hearts to initially display.

  • 字段详细资料

    • HEART_IMAGE_NAME

      private static final String HEART_IMAGE_NAME
      The path to the heart image file. This image is used to represent a life in the game.
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

    • HEART_HEIGHT

      private static final int HEART_HEIGHT
      The height of the heart images in pixels.
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

    • INDEX_OF_FIRST_ITEM

      private static final int INDEX_OF_FIRST_ITEM
      The index used to remove the first heart from the container when a life is lost.
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

    • container

      private javafx.scene.layout.HBox container
      The container that holds the heart images. It is used to organize the hearts horizontally on the screen.

    • containerXPosition

      private double containerXPosition
      The x-coordinate of the heart container's position.

    • containerYPosition

      private double containerYPosition
      The y-coordinate of the heart container's position.

    • numberOfHeartsToDisplay

      private int numberOfHeartsToDisplay
      The number of hearts to initially display.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • HeartDisplay

      public HeartDisplay(double xPosition, double yPosition, int heartsToDisplay)
      Constructs a HeartDisplay object, initializing the heart container and the hearts to be displayed.
      参数:
      xPosition - the x-coordinate of the heart container
      yPosition - the y-coordinate of the heart container
      heartsToDisplay - the initial number of hearts to display

  • 方法详细资料

    • initializeContainer

      private void initializeContainer()
      Initializes the container that holds the hearts (HBox) and sets its position.

    • initializeHearts

      private void initializeHearts()
      Initializes the specified number of hearts and adds them to the container. The hearts are represented by ImageView objects, and each heart is sized appropriately.

    • removeHeart

      public void removeHeart()
      Removes the first heart from the container, representing the loss of a life.

    • addHeart

      public void addHeart()
      Adds a heart to the container, representing the addition of a life.

    • getContainer

      public javafx.scene.layout.HBox getContainer()
      Gets the container holding the hearts.
      返回:
      the HBox containing the heart images
